api_list.name: MessageV2
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://telegram102.p.rapidapi.com/telegram/get-messages-v2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "telegram102.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
